name: Instructions: Pyroculus Resonance Stone
desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Pyroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Pyroculi.

customize.name: Pyroculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc:
A stone that can be used in Natlan to search for nearby Pyroculi.
During its crafting, adjustments were made to imbue it with characteristics resembling those of the Pyro Statues of The Seven, allowing one to sense the blazing power of the Pyroculi through it.
By sacrificing oneself, the Pyroculi can be returned to the statue, reuniting the scattered flames. Perhaps the Resonance Stone deems this sacrifice to be worth it.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Quenepa Berry
customize.desc: Bluish, juicy berries that grow in large amounts near the Scions of the Canopy. Their shape is similar to that of Flamegranates.

customize.name: Sprayfeather Gill
customize.desc: A special feather-shaped species of plant that grows by the seaside. It looks kind of like a seagrass but is in truth a soft-bodied aquatic coral with a unique shape.

customize.name: Crystal Chunk
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

customize.name: Instructions: Anemoculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Anemoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to towards Anemoculi.

customize.name: Instructions: Geoculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Geoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to towards Geoculi.

customize.name: Instructions: Electroculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Electroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Electroculi.

customize.name: Instructions: Dendroculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Dendroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Dendroculi.

customize.name: Instructions: Hydroculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Hydroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Hydroculi.

value.text: Learn to craft Pyroculus Resonance Stone.
Reach Tribe Reputation Level 4 with 4 tribes in Natlan
